title: Advertisement, "Eskay's Pentaplex", 1945–55
medium: Offset lithograph on coated white paper
inscribed: Imprinted diagonally, left half of sheet, in red:  We suggest that your prescriptions for; in white:  Eskay's Pentaplex/in red:  specify at least 2 teaspoonfuls 3 times daily./in white:  supplied in 12 fl. oz. bottles;  right half of sheet, in black:  Eskay's; in white:  Pentaplex/in black:  makes B Complex therapy/palatable; along lower edge, left, in red:  Smith, Kline & French Laboratories, Philadelphia, Pa.; lower center:  PX: 446; lower right corner, in white:  Paul Rand
description: Advertisement design for a drug company.  On yellow ground, three silhouettes of bowl and branch of spoon (image cut off by edge of sheet):  black (on left of sheet) and red (above white on right side of sheet).  Name of medicine imprinted on black and red "spoons"; photo image of smiling young girl in braids on white "spoon."
